.ticker{list-style-type:none;min-width:250px;padding-left:0;font-weight:700}.ticker__coin{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}#ticker-change-hr{font-size:.6rem;font-weight:400;color:grey;text-transform:lowercase;letter-spacing:1px}.ticker__buy-container{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;margin-top:.5rem;margin-bottom:1rem}.ticker__input{width:80%;border:none;border-radius:5px 0 0 5px;height:2rem;text-align:right;padding-right:.5rem;background-color:var(--color-primary-0)}.ticker__buy-btn{border:none;width:20%;border-radius:0 5px 5px 0}.inventory{list-style-type:none;min-width:250px;padding-left:0;font-weight:700}.inventory__coin{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.coin__name{min-width:50px}.coin__name,.coin__value{color:var(--color-computer-green)}.coin__value{min-width:100px;text-align:left;font-weight:400}.coin__change{min-width:50px;text-align:right}.coin__change--red{color:var(--color-computer-red)}.coin__change--green{color:var(--color-coin-green)}#inventory-change-hr{font-size:.6rem;font-weight:400;color:grey;text-transform:lowercase;letter-spacing:1px}.coin__value--fiat{min-width:100px;text-align:left;color:var(--color-coin-altgreen);font-weight:400}.social-container{overflow-y:scroll}::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:#f1f1f1}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:#888}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:#555}.event-log{padding:.5rem 1rem;margin-bottom:1rem;width:80vw;text-transform:none;letter-spacing:0;font-family:monospace;font-size:.7rem;color:var(--color-primary-0b)}.event-log__date{display:inline;font-size:.8rem}.event-log__log{margin:.5rem auto 0}.event-log__delete{padding:.2rem;margin-left:.5rem;font-size:.7rem;color:var(--color-secondary-2-1);border:1px solid var(--color-secondary-2-1)}.event-log__delete:hover{filter:brightness(50%)}@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Source+Code+Pro:wght@300;400;600&display=swap");:root{--color-primary-0b:#000;--color-primary-0:#fffaf6;--color-primary-1:#b9a08d;--color-primary-2:#e4ccb9;--color-primary-3:#fffaf6;--color-primary-4:#eee9e6;--color-secondary-1-0:#d1d4d7;--color-secondary-1-1:#5f6a7a;--color-secondary-1-2:#7c8796;--color-secondary-1-3:#a8aaae;--color-secondary-1-4:#97999c;--color-secondary-2-0:#dfe7df;--color-secondary-2-1:#6f9271;--color-secondary-2-2:#92b394;--color-secondary-2-2:#c5cdc6;--color-secondary-2-4:#b5bbb5;--color-computer-green:#32cd32;--color-computer-red:red;--color-coin-green:green;--color-coin-altgreen:#adff2f}html{box-sizing:border-box}body{margin:0;font-size:14px;font-family:Source Code Pro,Courier New,Courier,monospace,sans-serif}.limegreen{color:#32cd32}.menu-bars{position:fixed;top:1rem;right:2rem;z-index:10;display:inline;cursor:pointer}.bar1,.bar2,.bar3{width:35px;height:2px;background-color:#32cd32;margin:8px 0;transition:.4s}.change .bar1{transform:rotate(-45deg) translate(-7px,8px)}.change .bar2{opacity:0}.change .bar3{transform:rotate(45deg) translate(-6px,-8px)}.overlay{position:fixed;z-index:9;top:0;left:0;width:100vw;height:100vh;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.5);transform:translateX(-100vw)}.overlay-slide-in{transition:all .4s ease-in-out;transform:translateX(0)}.overlay-slide-out{transition:all .8s ease-in-out;transform:translateX(-100vw)}@keyframes slide-in{0%{transform:translate(-100vw)}to{transform:translate(0)}}@keyframes slide-out{0%{transform:translate(0)}to{transform:translate(-100vw)}}.nav-1-slide-in{animation:slide-in .2s linear .1s both}.nav-2-slide-in{animation:slide-in .2s linear .2s both}.nav-3-slide-in{animation:slide-in .2s linear .3s both}.nav-4-slide-in{animation:slide-in .2s linear .4s both}.nav-5-slide-in{animation:slide-in .2s linear .5s both}.nav-6-slide-in{animation:slide-in .2s linear .6s both}.nav-1-slide-out{animation:slide-out .2s linear .6s both}.nav-2-slide-out{animation:slide-out .2s linear .5s both}.nav-3-slide-out{animation:slide-out .2s linear .4s both}.nav-4-slide-out{animation:slide-out .2s linear .3s both}.nav-5-slide-out{animation:slide-out .2s linear .2s both}.nav-6-slide-out{animation:slide-out .2s linear .1s both}nav,nav ul{height:100vh;margin:0;padding:0;text-align:center}nav ul{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:stretch;list-style:none}.nav-links li{height:17%;overflow:hidden}.nav-links a:before{left:0}.nav-links a:after,.nav-links a:before{content:"";width:25vw;height:4px;background-color:#32cd32;position:absolute;top:45%;opacity:0;transition:opacity .2s ease-in-out}.nav-links a:after{right:0}.nav-links a:hover:after,.nav-links a:hover:before{opacity:1}.nav-links li a{text-decoration:none;position:relative;top:40%;display:block;color:var(--color-primary-0);color:#000;font-size:1rem;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:4px;transition:color .2s ease-in-out,letter-spacing .2s ease-in-out}.nav-links a:hover{color:#32cd32;letter-spacing:6px}.nav-links li:first-child{background-color:var(--color-secondary-1-0)}.nav-links li:nth-child(2){background-color:var(--color-secondary-1-1)}.nav-links li:nth-child(3){background-color:var(--color-secondary-1-2)}.nav-links li:nth-child(4){background-color:var(--color-secondary-2-1)}.nav-links li:nth-child(5){background-color:var(--color-primary-2)}.nav-links li:nth-child(6){background-color:var(--color-secondary-1-4)}section{width:100%;height:100vh;position:relative;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:2px;color:var(--color-primary-0)}section#home{background-image:url(71c150632bce48268eaab7042c59421f.jpg);background-size:cover;background-position:50%}section#market{background-color:var(--color-secondary-1-0)}section#inventory{background-color:var(--color-secondary-1-1)}section#stats{background-color:var(--color-secondary-1-2)}section#news{background-color:var(--color-secondary-1-3)}section#settings{background-color:var(--color-secondary-1-4)}@media (max-width:600px){section#home a{top:1rem;left:1rem}.menu-bars{top:.5rem;right:1rem}}
